definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 3:3, 1Ch 5:23, a city so named as seat of the worship of Baal. ‘The crest of Hermon is strewn with ruins and the foundations of a circular temple of large hewn stones,’ Tristr:Tpg, cf. on sacredness, Euseb. Lag:Onom 217: possibly = [[בעל גד]] q.v.
